Kindle cracker is a android application for converting kindle books into pdf format for personal use only.

After filling all the required value and started the application by pressing the button go to kindle app and open the book which you want to convert that\'s all the Kindle Cracker Will do the remaining things for you.
To convert PDF from Kindle book we need to go through page by page, To achieve this we need to touch on the screen. So the X,Y coordinates are points where you want to touch on the screen.

The X,Y coordinates are obtained from the below steps Menu > Settings > Developer options > Pointer location[Turn on]. 

 If you don't have developer options in your Settings follow below steps Menu > Settings > About phone > Build number [Tap 5 or more times]. 

 After pointer location turned on go to kindle app and open your book and touch for go to next page now you can see the X,Y points in the top of your display [in my phone X=617,Y=1098].
File name is a name for your converted PDF file name.
The converted files will be saved in Internal Storage > Kindle Cracker > Your File name > File_Name.pdf

Total number of pages indicates how many pages in the book.[if you want to reduce the page numbers in kindle set Margins —> Narrow, Line Spacing —> Narrow, Alignment —> Auto, Text size —> Small as much]

If you don\'t know the number of pages in the book to convert pdf or it\'s to large to count don\'t worry just put 0.But Be careful it will change page infinitely, You need to manually stop if the book reached last page.
Preparing time is a time interval for preparing the kindle App for user.The conversion will start after preparing time.

If you want to convert 1000 pages of book but due to some reasons you want to convert 100 pages today and remaining pages tomorrow or some other day you can use this option.[You need to put exactly from which page you want to continue, You can see Page number from already converted file]
The Compress option will compress the PDF file compress the size of the PDF file.[Before compressing the pdf file take a sample copy for a single page for quality check]

If you want to continue conversion from already converted pdf file click the given check box and put the page number from where you what to convert pdf file. before starting the application go to kindle and open the book and go to the page from where you want to continue.[You need to put same FILE NAME for continue the conversion]
Suggestion: If any notification came while converting, that will also shown in the pdf so you can put the phone in flight mode.[Optional]
